    • Constructor Detail

      • InMemoryCFProvider

        public InMemoryCFProvider(byte[][] data,
                          int[] ids)
        Instantiate an in-memory coverage feature provider
        Parameters:
        data - the data to provide.
        ids - optionally, an array of unique id numbers. if this is null, the index number is used as the id number.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if data is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if ids is given but has different length than data.

      • getID

        public int getID(int i)
        Description copied from interface: CoverageFeatureProvider
        Get the unique ID number of the i-th sentence. This may or may not be the same as i. However, it can be assumed that IDs are ordered: if i > j, getID(i) > getID(j).
        Specified by:
        getID in interface CoverageFeatureProvider
        Parameters:
        i - i
        Returns:
        ID
